attributes.action: invest in more satellite units to allow renal patients to connect themselves on to the dialysis machine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to reduce the nurse ratio to patients in satellite units.  It will be better for the government to invest in buildings which allow fit renal patients to put themselves on to the dialysis machines. This will allow patients more flexibility and also those patients who would want to work to finish dialysis at a reasonable hour.
